summary: Integrates Wink binary sensor devices into Home Assistant by representing each sensor type (e.g., generic binary sensor, button, gang, hub, remote, smoke detector) as a Home Assistant binary sensor entity with appropriate state, device class, and attributes.
business_intent: Enable Home Assistant users to monitor and automate Wink binary sensors and related devices through a unified platform, providing real-time status, battery information, and device-specific attributes for smart-home control.
